pluginstrument.author: Simstrumentation
pluginstrument.description:
G1000 NXi for Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020
Compatible with both stock G1000 and Working Title G1000 NXi v 0.8.0 or better.
NOTES: - Map panning currently only works with default G1000. Map panning is not currently active in the WT G1000 NXi v 0.8.0 or older.
